      • addServiceData

                                               byte[] serviceData)
        Adds the specified service data to this advertisement.
        Parameters:
        uuid - Indicates the UUID of the service data to add.
        serviceData - Indicates the service data to add.
        Throws:

      • addManufacturerData

        public BleAdvertiseData.Builder addManufacturerData​(int manufacturerId,
                                                    byte[] data)
        Adds the specified manufacturer data to this advertisement.
        Parameters:
        manufacturerId - Indicates the manufacturer ID assigned by Bluetooth SIG.
        data - Indicates the manufacturer data to add.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if manufacturerId is a negative number or data is null.
        Since:
        3
